member.name: T:SadConsole.Consoles.ControlsConsole
member.summary: A basic console that can contain controls.

member.name: F:SadConsole.Consoles.ControlsConsole.updateKeyboardState
member.summary: When set to false, when the ControlsConsole has called, will not be updated.

member.name: P:SadConsole.Consoles.ControlsConsole.Theme
member.summary: Gets or sets the theme of the window.

member.name: P:SadConsole.Consoles.ControlsConsole.ProcessMouseWithoutFocus
member.summary: When true, mouse events over this console will be processed even if this console is not active.

member.name: P:SadConsole.Consoles.ControlsConsole.Controls
member.summary: Gets a read-only collection of the controls this console contains.

member.name: P:SadConsole.Consoles.ControlsConsole.CapturedControl
member.summary: Gets the control currently capturing mouse events.

member.name: P:SadConsole.Consoles.ControlsConsole.FocusedControl
member.summary: Gets or sets the control that has keyboard focus.

member.name: P:SadConsole.Consoles.ControlsConsole.CanTabToNextConsole
member.summary: When true, allows the tab command to move to the next console (when there is a parent) instead of cycling back to the first control on this console.

member.name: P:SadConsole.Consoles.ControlsConsole.NextTabConsole
member.summary: Sets reference to the console to tab to when the property is true. Set this to null to allow the engine to determine the next console.

member.name: P:SadConsole.Consoles.ControlsConsole.PreviousTabConsole
member.summary: Sets reference to the console to tab to when the property is true. Set this to null to allow the engine to determine the next console.

member.name: P:SadConsole.Consoles.ControlsConsole.DisableControlFocusing
member.summary: When set to true, child controls are not alerted to (non-)focused states.

member.name: M:SadConsole.Consoles.ControlsConsole.#ctor(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Creates a new instance of the controls console with the specified width and height.
member.param: The graphics device to render this console on.

member.name: M:SadConsole.Consoles.ControlsConsole.Add(SadConsole.Controls.ControlBase)
member.summary: Adds an existing control to this console.

member.name: M:SadConsole.Consoles.ControlsConsole.Remove(SadConsole.Controls.ControlBase)
member.summary: Removes a control from this console.

member.name: M:SadConsole.Consoles.ControlsConsole.TabNextControl
member.summary: Gives the focus to the next control in the tab order.

member.name: M:SadConsole.Consoles.ControlsConsole.TabPreviousControl
member.summary: Gives focus to the previous control in the tab order.

member.name: M:SadConsole.Consoles.ControlsConsole.RemoveAll
member.summary: Removes all controls from this console.

member.name: M:SadConsole.Consoles.ControlsConsole.Contains(SadConsole.Controls.ControlBase)
member.summary: Checks if the specified control exists in this console.
member.returns: True when the control exists in this console; otherwise false.

member.name: M:SadConsole.Consoles.ControlsConsole.FocusedControlChanging(SadConsole.Controls.ControlBase,SadConsole.Controls.ControlBase)
member.summary: When overridden, allows you to prevent a control from taking focus from another control.
member.returns: True when the focus change is allowed; otherwise false.

member.name: M:SadConsole.Consoles.ControlsConsole.FocusedControlChanged(SadConsole.Controls.ControlBase,SadConsole.Controls.ControlBase)
member.summary: This method is called when a control gains focus. Unless overridden, this method calls the DetermineAppearance method both the and parameters.
member.param: The control that previously had focus.

member.name: M:SadConsole.Consoles.ControlsConsole.ReOrderControls
member.summary: Reorders the control collection based on the tab index of each control.

member.name: M:SadConsole.Consoles.ControlsConsole.ProcessKeyboard(SadConsole.Input.KeyboardInfo)
member.summary: Processes the keyboard for the console.
member.param: Keyboard information sent by the engine.

member.name: M:SadConsole.Consoles.ControlsConsole.ProcessMouse(SadConsole.Input.MouseInfo)
member.summary: Processes the mouse for the console.
member.param: Mouse information sent by the engine.
member.returns: True when the mouse is over this console and it is the active console; otherwise false.

member.name: M:SadConsole.Consoles.ControlsConsole.CaptureControl(SadConsole.Controls.ControlBase)
member.summary: Captures a control for exclusive mouse focus. Sets the ExclusiveMouse property to true.

member.name: M:SadConsole.Consoles.ControlsConsole.ReleaseControl
member.summary: Releases the control from exclusive mouse focus. Sets the ExclusiveMouse property to false and sets the CapturedControl property to null.

member.name: M:SadConsole.Consoles.ControlsConsole.GetEnumerator
member.summary: Gets an enumerator of the controls collection.
member.returns: The enumerator of the controls collection.

member.name: M:SadConsole.Consoles.ControlsConsole.System#Collections#IEnumerable#GetEnumerator
member.summary: Gets an enumerator of the controls collection.
member.returns: The enumerator of the controls collection.

member.name: M:SadConsole.Consoles.ControlsConsole.Update
member.summary: Calls the Update method of the base class and then Update on each control.

member.summary: The sprite batch used for drawing to the screen.

member.summary: Renders a surface to the screen.

member.summary: Called when the control changes position.

member.name: M:SadConsole.Controls.ControlBase.DetermineAppearance
member.summary: Sets the appropriate theme for the control based on the current state of the control.
member.remarks: Called by the control as the mouse state changes, like when the mouse is clicked on top of the control or leaves the area of the control. This method is implemented by each derived control.

member.name: M:SadConsole.Controls.ControlBase.OnMouseEnter(SadConsole.Input.MouseInfo)
member.summary: Called when the mouse first enters the control. Raises the MouseEnter event and calls the method.

member.name: M:SadConsole.Controls.ControlBase.OnMouseExit(SadConsole.Input.MouseInfo)
member.summary: Called when the mouse exits the area of the control. Raises the MouseExit event and calls the method.

member.name: M:SadConsole.Controls.ControlBase.OnMouseIn(SadConsole.Input.MouseInfo)
member.summary: Called as the mouse moves around the control area. Raises the MouseMove event and calls the method.

member.name: M:SadConsole.Controls.ControlBase.OnLeftMouseClicked(SadConsole.Input.MouseInfo)
member.summary: Called when the left mouse button is clicked. Raises the MouseButtonClicked event and calls the method.

member.name: M:SadConsole.Controls.ControlBase.OnRightMouseClicked(SadConsole.Input.MouseInfo)
member.summary: Called when the right mouse button is clicked. Raises the MouseButtonClicked event and calls the method.

member.summary: Helper method that returns the mouse x,y position for the control.

member.returns: The x,y position of the mouse over the control.

member.summary: Redraw the lastest appearance of the control.
member.remarks: This method is implemented by each derived control.

member.summary: Redraw the latest appearance of the control if is set to true.
member.param: Force the draw to happen by setting IsDirty as true.

member.summary: Update the control. Calls Compose() and then updates each cell effect if needed.

member.summary: Provides a button-like control that changes focus to a designated previous or next selection button when the arrow keys are pushed.

member.summary: The selection button to focus when the UP key is pressed or the SelectPrevious() method is called.

member.summary: The selection button to focus when the UP key is pressed or the SelectNext() method is called.

member.param: The width of the selection button.

member.name: M:SadConsole.Controls.SelectionButton.SetNextSelection(SadConsole.Controls.SelectionButton@,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Sets the next selection button and optionally sets the previous of the referenced selection to this button.
member.param: The selection button to be used as next.
Sets the PreviousSelection property on the instance to current selection button. Defaults to true.

member.summary: Focuses the previous or next selection button depending on if the UP or DOWN arrow keys were pressed.
